name: Five Nights At Roblox Tycoon 2
description:
You got a job running a roblox tycoon night shift! (FUN WORK)

Those things don't run themselves. (FOR THE MOST PART)

Use the camera to repair broken generators, collect money, or report intruders! (EXCITING)

Stop hackers from taking your money! (SUSPENSEFUL)

Buy upgrades to help you get through this! (IMPACTFUL)

Watch ads to get double the money! (FREE TO PLAY)

Possibly keep your job and never  get paid! (FAIR)

Why only five nights? Well, who likes working weekends? (maybe a few challenges?)

HOW TO RUN GAME:

> unzip/extract FNART2.zip

> open FNART2 folder

> doubleclick/run battleRoyale.exe

> if Windows says it's potentially harmful:
>> 1. click more options

>> 2. run anyway (it's safe)

***other than some basic gameplay aspects and the name, there really isn't much directly relating to roblox or fnaf
